articles.author: sport
articles.title: De Leede propels Dutch past Scots into Cricket World Cup
articles.description: A magnificent all-round performance by Bas de Leede secured The Netherlands the final spot in the Cricket World Cup after they beat Scotland by four wickets on Thursday.
articles.content:
A magnificent all-round performance by Bas de Leede secured
The Netherlands the final spot in the Cricket World Cup after they beat
Scotland by four wickets on Thursday.

articles.title: Australia clashes at Lord's 'brought shame' on MCC
articles.description: Marylebone Cricket Club members involved in altercations with Australia players in the Long Room at Lord's "brought shame" on the club, says the organisation's chair.
articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
